full_threads.body:
Hi Jacqueline,

You can reset your password by heading to this link:
https://www.designtiles.com.au/my-account/lost-password/

Some of the admin level passwords are reset as a best practice security process during migration.

Thank you Heath for the update.

Im trying to login into the website - has the login details changed?




Please leave us a review here

Hi Jacqueline,

We have removed the PayLater text from the payment options. That was related to AfterPay, and didn't automatically remove itself when we turned off AfterPay.

Hi Heath

What is the paylater option? Is that under afterpay?




Please leave us a review Here

Hi Jacqueline,

Confirming we have removed the other payments, so the check out only has the 2 options of PayPal and Credit card.

Reference screenshot is attached.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello

Yes please go ahead.




Please leave us a review here

Hi Team

Can you also remove the After Pay and Pay Later option on our website.
We want to keep it to paypal and credit card only for payments.

Thank you




Please leave us a review here

Subject: RE: [Design Tiles Sydney]: New order #92782

Hi team,

Do we know what Pay Later means - if its afterpay it usually comes up as that. Tjere shouldn't be a "Pay later" option

Kavita can you check tomorrow if payment has been received?

Thank you
